1370: Boidin moved to Muelen straet.A.5 after marriage.
Got married to Suaneka at age 21 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Suaneka, Lelien, at age 22.
1372: Had a son with Suaneka, Eggerdus, at age 23.
Lost son Eggerdus when Eggerdus was 1 years old.
1374: Had a son with Suaneka, Gabriel, at age 25.
1376: Had a son with Suaneka, Reuro, at age 27.
1377: Lost his wife Suaneka while she was giving birth to Hersewindis in 1377.
Became caretaker of Lelien, Gabriel, Reuro, Hersewindis at age 29.
1387: Lost daughter Lelien when Lelien was 17 years old.
